title: Heliod, Sun-Crowned
desc:
Post 393
- You can't discard or replace this card.
- __If a player would be forced to draw cards, they draw X less cards, where X is the number of cards they've discarded this game.__
- __If a player would forced another player to draw cards, the forced player draws X more cards, where X is the number of cards the forcing player has discarded this game.__
- __Players may change two of their cards with a positive effects into **1**s with no effects at any time. If they do, they choose a player other than themself. xThe next time that player would force a player to draw cards, they get a Lifeshield of that many cards. They may use cards of their Lifeshield to prevent themself from drawing cards at any time.__
